description.zh-cn: 中国元朝末年群雄之一，红巾军领袖。他在濠州起兵，后接纳并重用朱元璋，成为其岳父。因内部纷争离开濠州，移驻滁州，病逝后势力被朱元璋继承。明朝建立后，被朱元璋追封为滁阳王。
description.en: One of the warlords in the late Yuan dynasty of China and a leader of the Red Turban Army. He rose up in Haozhou, later accepted and heavily relied on Zhu Yuanzhang, becoming his father-in-law. Due to internal conflicts, he left Haozhou and moved to Chuzhou, where he died of illness. His forces were subsequently inherited by Zhu Yuanzhang. After the founding of the Ming dynasty, he was posthumously enfeoffed as the Prince of Chuyang by Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国皇帝。早年投奔郭子兴，因战功受其重用，并成为其女婿。在郭子兴去世后，他继承了其大部分势力，并最终建立了明朝。
description.en: Founding emperor of the Ming dynasty. He joined Guo Zixing in his early years, was heavily utilized for his military achievements, and became his son-in-law. After Guo Zixing's death, he inherited most of his forces and eventually established the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 位于今中国安徽省，是郭子兴的出生地。
description.en: Located in present-day Anhui Province, China, it is the birthplace of Guo Zixing.

description.zh-cn: 郭子兴因内部纷争而移驻的地点，也是其病逝之处。
description.en: The place where Guo Zixing relocated due to internal conflicts and also where he died of illness.

description.zh-cn: 郭子兴于1352年起兵攻占的地点。
description.en: The location captured by Guo Zixing when he started his rebellion in 1352.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上由蒙古族建立的统一王朝，为郭子兴等红巾军起义所反对的目标。
description.en: A unified dynasty in Chinese history established by the Mongols, which was the target of opposition for the Red Turban rebellions, including Guo Zixing's.

description.zh-cn: 元朝末年，由农民等阶层发起的一系列反抗元朝的武装力量，郭子兴是其早期领袖之一。
description.en: A series of armed forces initiated by peasants and other classes against the Yuan dynasty in its final years; Guo Zixing was one of its early leaders.

description.zh-cn: 郭子兴次子，与舅舅张天祐领军攻打集庆府时，兵败被杀。
description.en: The second son of Guo Zixing. He was defeated and killed while leading an army to attack Jiqingfu with his maternal uncle Zhang Tianyou.

description.zh-cn: 郭子兴第三子，因图谋对付姐夫朱元璋而被其处死。
description.en: The third son of Guo Zixing. He was executed by his brother-in-law Zhu Yuanzhang for plotting against him.

description.zh-cn: 郭子兴的妻弟，与外甥郭天叙一同领军攻打集庆府时，兵败被杀。
description.en: Guo Zixing's brother-in-law. He was defeated and killed while leading an army to attack Jiqingfu with his nephew Guo Tianxu.

description.zh-cn: 郭子兴之女，朱元璋的妃子，生蜀、谷、代三王。
description.en: Daughter of Guo Zixing and a concubine of Zhu Yuanzhang, to whom she bore three princes: the Prince of Shu, the Prince of Gu, and the Prince of Dai.

description.zh-cn: 郭子兴的养女，朱元璋的结发妻子和皇后。
description.en: The adopted daughter of Guo Zixing, and the primary wife and empress of Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 元末红巾军领袖，与郭子兴一同起兵，但后来发生内部争斗。
description.en: A leader of the Red Turban Army in the late Yuan dynasty. He rose up together with Guo Zixing but later engaged in internal conflict with him.

description.zh-cn: 元末红巾军领袖，与郭子兴一同起兵，但后来发生内部争斗。
description.en: A leader of the Red Turban Army in the late Yuan dynasty. He rose up together with Guo Zixing but later engaged in internal conflict with him.

description.zh-cn: 郭子兴是元末红巾军领袖之一。
description.en: Guo Zixing was one of the leaders of the Red Turban Army in the late Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 于至正十二年（1352年）在濠州集结数千人起兵反抗元朝统治。
description.en: In 1352 (the 12th year of the Zhizheng era), he gathered several thousand men in Haozhou to rebel against the rule of the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 郭子兴在濠州起兵后，任用朱元璋为十夫长，后因其战功而重用。
description.en: After Guo Zixing started his uprising in Haozhou, he appointed Zhu Yuanzhang as a decurion and later heavily relied on him due to his military achievements.

description.zh-cn: 郭子兴重用朱元璋，并将女儿和养女嫁给他，为其崛起提供了重要支持。郭子兴去世后，其势力大部分由朱元璋继承。
description.en: Guo Zixing placed great trust in Zhu Yuanzhang, married his daughter and adopted daughter to him, providing crucial support for his rise. After Guo Zixing's death, most of his forces were inherited by Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 郭子兴的养女。
description.en: The adopted daughter of Guo Zixing.

description.zh-cn: 郭子兴的妻弟。
description.en: Guo Zixing's brother-in-law (wife's younger brother).

description.zh-cn: 郭子兴与孙德崖在濠州阵营内发生内斗。
description.en: Guo Zixing engaged in internal conflict with Sun Deyai within their camp at Haozhou.

description.zh-cn: 郭子兴与赵均用在濠州阵营内发生内斗。
description.en: Guo Zixing engaged in internal conflict with Zhao Junyong within their camp at Haozhou.

description.zh-cn: 因郭天爵阴谋对付自己，朱元璋将其杀死。
description.en: Zhu Yuanzhang killed Guo Tianjue because Guo was plotting against him.

description.zh-cn: 阴谋对付朱元璋。
description.en: Plotted against Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 明朝建立后，朱元璋于洪武三年（1370年）追封其岳父郭子兴为滁阳王，并为其建庙祭祀。
description.en: After founding the Ming dynasty, Zhu Yuanzhang posthumously enfeoffed his father-in-law Guo Zixing as the Prince of Chuyang in 1370 (the third year of the Hongwu era) and built a temple for his worship.

description.zh-cn: 共同领军攻打集庆府，但兵败被杀。
description.en: Jointly led an army to attack Jiqingfu, but they were defeated and killed.
